ChangeDescriptions.ChangeDescription: Version 2.39: Updated the Path object to provide a 'State Assignments' property category.

Version 2.40: Removed the Path object's 'Close' and 'Open' public processes. For equivalent functionality, use the Assign step and assign the path's DesiredDirection state to the value 'Enum.TrafficDirection.None' to close entry onto the path, or to the value 'Enum.TrafficDirection.Either' to re-open entry onto the path. In the object process logic, the 'Action' property for all Execute steps executing an 'add-on process' is now specified as 'WaitUntilCompleted'.
Version 2.41: Updated the assignments repeat groups to take state units into account.
Version 3.42: Changes related to setting the 'Token Associated Object Destroyed Action' option for process logic in this object.
Version 3.47: Added new 'Appearance' property category.
Version 3.49: Specified the 'OnAssociatedObjectTransferRequested' property of some processes as 'EndProcess'.
Version 3.51: Do not display new link 'Cell Spacing Type', 'Cell Size', and 'Auto Align Cells' properties.
Version 3.54: Conversion to 'OnRunInitialized' standard interface process. Added 'Run Ending' add-on process trigger.
Version 3.57: Added logic for new 'OnTurnedAround' standard interface process.
Version 4.58: Added new 'Advanced Options' property category.
Version 4.59: Process logic now uses new entity 'NextEntityAheadOnLink' function instead of deprecated 'FrontTraffic.Speed' function
Version 4.61: Set all inherited properties in 'Financials' category to not be visible.
Version 4.63: Reordered the position of the 'Financials' property category.
Version 4.68: Changed 'TravelerCapacity' integer property to 'InitialTravelerCapacity' expression property. Renamed 'InitializedAddOnProcess' property to 'RunInitializedAddOnProcess'.
Version 4.76: Updates required due to Suspend & Resume step enhancements.
Version 5.85: Process logic changes to better support an entity on the path being destroyed before reaching the end of the link.
Version 5.87: Process logic now uses new property 'HasValue' function instead of deprecated 'IsDefined'.
Version 5.88: 'OnCollisionCleared' process - Improvements to entity movement rate assignment expression to better avoid null pointer exceptions.
Version 5.91: Added information to indicate which properties to display if the new 'Show Commonly Used Properties Only' option is enabled.
Version 6.103: Some property description updates.
Version 8.147: Property description string updates.
Version 9.161: New TokenMatchCondition property added to Suspend & Resume steps.
Version 9.164: OnCollisionCleared process logic - Fixed entity movement rate assignment expression to never assign a value greater than the entity's desired speed.

BooleanProperty.Name: AllowPassing
BooleanProperty.Description: Indicates whether passing is allowed on this path. Passing means that entities will not be blocked along the path, but instead will pass each other if speeds vary.

RealProperty.Name: SpeedLimit
RealProperty.Description: The maximum speed at which an entity can travel along this path.

RepeatingProperty.Name: AssignmentsOnEntering
RepeatingProperty.Description: Optional state assignments when an entity is entering the object.

StateProperty.Name: AssignmentsOnEnteringStateVariableName
StateProperty.Description: Name of the state variable that will be assigned a new value.

RepeatingProperty.Name: AssignmentsBeforeExiting
RepeatingProperty.Description: Optional state assignments when an entity is ready to exit the object.

StateProperty.Name: AssignmentsBeforeExitingStateVariableName
StateProperty.Description: Name of the state variable that will be assigned a new value.

ElementProperty.Name: RunInitializedAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when the simulation run is initialized.

ElementProperty.Name: RunEndingAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when the simulation run is ending.

ElementProperty.Name: EnteredAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when an entity's leading edge has entered this path.

ElementProperty.Name: TrailingEdgeEnteredAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when an entity's trailing edge has entered this path.

ElementProperty.Name: ReachedEndAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when an entity's leading edge has reached the end of this path.

ElementProperty.Name: ExitedAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when an entity has exited this path.
